This package.json (JSON) is automatically generated from package/*.cson (CSON)
.-: DO NOT invoke 'npm init' or 'npm install --save' ('--save-dev' / '--save-optional')
._: as this would overwrite / update the JSON, not the master CSON!
name: readium-js-viewer
description: Readium web app - online cloud reader, offline Chrome extension/app

scripts.cson2json: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/concat.js "package/*.cson" package.cson && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cson/bin/cson2json package.cson > package.json && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js package.cson && node readium-js/readium-shared-js/readium-build-tools/optimizePackageJsonScripts.js
scripts.prepare:all: npm run prepare:submodule && npm run prepare:local
scripts.prepare:local: (npm outdated || echo outdated) && (npm ci || npm install) && npm run prepare:local:common
scripts.prepare:yarn:all: yarn run prepare:yarn:submodule && yarn run prepare:yarn:local
scripts.prepare:yarn:local: (yarn outdated || echo outdated) && yarn install && yarn run prepare:local:common
scripts.prepare:submodule: cd readium-js && npm run prepare:all && cd .. && ls
scripts.prepare:yarn:submodule: cd readium-js && yarn run prepare:yarn:all && cd .. && ls
scripts.clean: (yarn --version || echo noyarn) && node --version && npm --version && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js api-docs/* && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js dist
scripts.build:scripts: npm run versioning && npm run build:scripts:multiple && npm run build:scripts:single && npm run build:scripts:single:CLOUDAPPWORKER --readium-js-viewer:RJS_UGLY=no
scripts.prebuild:scripts:multiple: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js build-output/XXX && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/ncp/bin/ncp src/templates/ build-output/XXX/templates/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/ncp/bin/ncp src/i18n/ build-output/XXX/i18n/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/version.json build-output/XXX/
scripts.postbuild:scripts:multiple: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/XXX && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/version.json && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/templates && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/i18n && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/migration && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/storage && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/versioning && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/workers && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/mathjax && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js build-output/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js build-output/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/inflate.js build-output/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js && node build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js.map build-output/ && ( node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js.map build-output/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/inflate.js.map build-output/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js.map && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js.map && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/inflate.js.src.js && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/deflate.js.src.js && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js build-output/_multiple-bundles/z-worker.js.src.js
scripts.dist: npm run dist:copy && npm run dist:cloudReader && npm run pack && npm run minify
scripts.distDev: npm run dist:copy && npm run dist:cloudReader && npm run pack
scripts.dist+sourcemap: npm run dist && npm run deploy:cloudReader:copy:sourcemap
scripts.dist:copy: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js dist/zip_sourcemap && ( node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/z-worker.js.map dist/zip_sourcemap && ( node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/deflate.js.map dist/zip_sourcemap && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/inflate.js.map dist/zip_sourcemap ) || ( echo "=== SUCCESS [ignore previous error]: no sourcemaps were generated for zip web-worker, deflate, inflate (no uglification)." && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/rimraf/bin.js dist/zip_sourcemap ) )
scripts.dist:cloudReader: npm run dist:cloudReader:copy && npm run dist:cloudReader:copy:fonts && npm run dist:cloudReader:css && npm run dist:cloudReader:js
scripts.dist:cloudReader:copy: node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js dist/cloud-reader/scripts/zip && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/mkdirp/bin/cmd.js dist/cloud-reader/scripts/mathjax && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js src/cloud-reader/index.html dist/cloud-reader/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/z-worker.js dist/cloud-reader/scripts/zip && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/deflate.js dist/cloud-reader/scripts/zip && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js build-output/inflate.js dist/cloud-reader/scripts/zip && node dist/cloud-reader/fonts/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js src/css/annotations.css dist/cloud-reader/css/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js src/cloud-reader/offlinePebl.appcache dist/cloud-reader/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js src/css/pebl-discussion-widget.css dist/cloud-reader/css/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js src/css/pebl-login-widget.css dist/cloud-reader/css/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js src/js/pebl-login-widget.js dist/cloud-reader/scripts/ && node ./readium-js/readium-shared-js/node_modules/cpy-cli/cli.js src/cloud-reader/config.js dist/cloud-reader/scripts/
